nodes.text: Vorlaggn were a sentient species native to Vorlag, a cavernous planet. They had skin like the cracked char on a piece of fire-cooked meat whose fissures suppurated clear fluid, three hollow-set eyes, and spoke in the third person, which could confuse individuals of other species. Slussen Urla-fir Kal Kethin-wa Canker, a male Vorlaggn crime lord, owned a palace on Vorlag.
Vorlaggn first appeared in Aftermath: Life Debt, the second novel in Chuck Wendig's Star Wars: The Aftermath Trilogy, which was released on July 12, 2016.
